SystemColumn.Formula:
IF( ARRAY_INDEXOF( ARRAY("Awarding", "Awarded", "Cancelled"), [Status] ) > 0, [Status],
[Procurement Cancelled] == TRUE, "Cancelled",
[Market Status] <> NULL, [Market Status],
OR( [Wizard Status] = "Not Started", [Wizard Status] = "In Progress", [Status] == NULL ), "Setup",
HASH_GET([Process Completion Hash - Stored], "Award") = TRUE, "Awarded",
[Current Stage] == "Plan", "Planning",
[Current Stage] == "Advertise", "Advertising",
[Current Stage] == "Evaluate", "Evaluating",
[Current Stage] == "Award", "Awarding",
[Status] )
IF([Procurement Title] <> NULL, [Procurement Title] & " - ") & IF([Estimated Value] <> NULL, [Estimated Value] & " - ") & [Status]

Column.Name: Procurement Title
Estimated Value
Column.ValidationFormula:
IF( $thisValue = NULL(), $thisColumn & " is required",
AND( [Exemption Info] <> NULL(), $thisValue > ARRAY_INDEX([Exemption Info], 4), [Procurement Category] = ARRAY_INDEX([Exemption Info], 3) ), "Exemption to use " & ARRAY_INDEX([Exemption Info], 3) & " for value up to " & NUMBERFORMAT(ARRAY_INDEX([Exemption Info],4), "$#,##0.00" ),
TRUE )

Column.Name: Procurement Category
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( $thisValue = NULL(), $thisColumn & " is required" )

Column.Name: SETTINGS
Column.DefaultValueFormula:
LET $cols:= ARRAY( "Can Add and Remove Roles", "Can Add Custom Roles", "Can Assign Non-System Users", "Can Add Guest Users for Evaluation", "External Evaluator Documents Access", "Market Request - Locked to Sourcing Team", "Supplier Discovery Enabled", "Regions of Service Visibility", "Regions of Service Mandatory", "Category and Subcategory Visibility", "Category and Subcategory Mandatory"//, //"UNSPSC Code Visibility" );
RETURN INDEXES_TO_KEYS( DB_LOOKUP( $cols, "Settings - Procurement", "[LineNumber] = 1" ), $cols )

Column.Name: Navigation
Column.Formula: IF( OR( [Navigation] = "", [Navigation] = NULL ), [Default View], [Navigation] )

Column.Name: Next Stage
Column.Formula: ARRAY_INDEX( [Stage List], [Current Stage Number] + 1 )

Column.Name: Procurement Officer Display Name
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( ISBLANK($thisValue), "A Procurement Officer is required" )

Column.Name: Role
Role is not a System User
Individual in Role

IF( 1 = 1, "No",
DB_LOOKUPALL( "Individual in Role", [EFormType], "[RecordID] = " & [RecordID] & " AND " & "[Individual in Role] IS NOT EMPTY" ) <> EACH [Individual in Role], "Roles have been changed while viewing record, please reload the record to do a reallocation" )

Column.Name: Vendor RecordID
New Vendor Company Name
New Vendor BusinessNumber
Document Attached to Reference
Documents Remaining
Exemption Info

Column.Name: Number of PO
Simple Process
Column.Formula:
IF( [Procurement Initiated] <> TRUE, FALSE,
ARRAY_LENGTH(HASH_KEYS([Process List]))>2, FALSE,
TRUE )

Column.Formula: [Procurement Title] & " (" & [Procurement Number] & ")"

Column.Name: Documentation Line Exists
Column.Formula: IF( [Document Name] <> NULL(), TRUE, [Documentation Line Exists] )

Value Risk Assessment Exists
Column.Formula: [Value Risk Assessment RecordID] <> NULL

Column.Name: Initial Assessment Result
Initial Assessment Exists

Column.Formula: [Initial Assessment Result] = "Value Risk Assessment Required"

Column.Name: Record Select
Column.Formula: COALESCE([Procurement Title], "Untitled Procurement")

Column.Name: Vendor Company Name
PO Data
Wizard Options
Column.DefaultValueFormula: HASH( "Click to Navigate", TRUE, "Click Completed", FALSE, "Validation", TRUE )

Column.Name: Answered HTML
Not Answered CSS
Sort Order
Column.Formula: IF( [Status] == "Rejected", 100, [Status] == "Cancelled", 100, [Status] == "Declined", 100, [Status] == "Awarded", 98, [Status] == "Initiating", 1, [Current Stage] == "Initiate", 10, [Current Stage] == "Plan", 20, [Current Stage] == "Advertise", 30, [Current Stage] == "Evaluate", 40, [Current Stage] == "Award", 50, 99 )

Column.Name: Submission Round
Column.Formula: COALESCE([Submission Round], [Submission Count])

Column.Name: Reason for Exemption
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( $thisValue = NULL, "Provide a reason for exemption" )

Column.Name: Visible Steps
Required Roles Populated
New Vendor Name
Column.ValidationFormula:
LET $match:= DB_LOOKUP( "Company Name", "Vendor", "[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND [Company Name Val] = "& DB_ENCODECONSTANT(UPPER($thisValue)), );
RETURN IF( ISBLANK($thisValue), $thisColumn & " cannot be empty", $match <> NULL(), "A Vendor with the same name exists already", TRUE )

Column.Name: New Business Number Type
Column.DefaultValueFormula: DB_LOOKUP( "Business Number Type", "Settings - Vendor", HASH("Default Business Number Type", TRUE) )

Outgoing - Closing Date
User is Cluster Admin

Column.Formula: IF( AND( ARRAY_INDEXOF([Visible Steps], "Download Responses") > 0, [Outgoing - Tender Description] = NULL ), [Scope of Work], [Outgoing - Tender Description] )

Column.Name: Outgoing - Tender Number
Column.Formula: IF( AND( ARRAY_INDEXOF([Visible Steps], "Download Responses") > 0, [Outgoing - Tender Number] = NULL ), [Procurement Number], [Outgoing - Tender Number] )

Column.Name: Outgoing - Total Cost Projection
Column.Formula: IF( AND( ARRAY_INDEXOF([Visible Steps], "Download Responses") > 0, [Outgoing - Total Cost Projection] = NULL ), [Estimated Value], FLOOR([Outgoing - Total Cost Projection]) )

Column.Name: Outgoing - Name of Tender
Column.Formula: IF( AND( ARRAY_INDEXOF([Visible Steps], "Download Responses") > 0, [Outgoing - Name of Tender] = NULL ), [Procurement Title], [Outgoing - Name of Tender] )

This Stage Process List
Integrated Modules

Column.Name: Title Text

Parent Chain

Column.ValidationFormula: IF( $thisValue = NULL, "Select a role" )

Column.ValidationFormula: IF( AND( $thisValue = NULL, [Contact - Select] = NULL ), "Select a person to allocate" )

Column.Name: Role - Freetext
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( AND( [Role - Select] = "Other", $thisValue = NULL ), "Enter a role" )

Column.Name: Process Properties
Column.Formula:
LET $disableValidation := FALSE;//[Demo Mode] = TRUE;
LET $processData := HASH( //START SETUP STEPS "High Level Details", HASH( "Display Name", "Details",
"Validation", ARRAY( IF([Procurement Title] = NULL, HASH("Error ID", "Procurement Title", "Message", "Please enter a title for this procurement")), IF([Procurement Background] = NULL, HASH("Error ID", "Procurement Background", "Message", "Please enter a background for this procurement")), IF([Scope of Work] = NULL, HASH("Error ID", "Scope of Work", "Message", "Please enter a scope for this procurement")), IF([Department] = NULL, HASH("Error ID", "Department", "Message", "Please select a department for this procurement")), IF(AND(HASH_GET([SETTINGS], "Regions of Service Mandatory") = TRUE, OR([Regions of Service] = ARRAY(), [Regions of Service] = NULL)), HASH("Error ID", "Regions of Service", "Message", "Please select at least one region")), IF(AND(HASH_GET([SETTINGS], "Category and Subcategory Mandatory") = TRUE, ARRAY_LENGTH(EACH [Category]) = 0), HASH("Error ID", "Category and Subcategory", "Message", "Please select at least one category")) ),
"Completion", AND( [Procurement Title] <> NULL, [Scope of Work] <> NULL, [Procurement Background] <> NULL, [Department] <> NULL, OR( HASH_GET([SETTINGS], "Regions of Service Mandatory") <> TRUE, [Regions of Service] <> NULL ), OR( HASH_GET([SETTINGS], "Category and Subcategory Mandatory") <> TRUE, ARRAY_LENGTH(EACH [Category]) > 0 ) ) ),
"Value", HASH( "Display Name", "Value",
"Validation", ARRAY( IF([Estimated Value] = NULL, HASH("Error ID", "Estimated Value", "Message", "Esimated Value is required")) ), "Completion", AND( NOT(ISBLANK([Estimated Value])) ) ),
"Procurement Process", HASH( "Display Name", "Procurement Process",
"Validation", ARRAY( IF([Procurement Category] = NULL, HASH("Error ID", "Procurement Category", "Message", "Procurement process is required")), IF(AND([Output] = "Subcontract", [Head Agreement RecordID] = NULL), HASH("Error ID", "Head Agreement RecordID", "Message", "A Head Agreement must be selected")) ), "Completion", AND( ARRAY_INDEXOF([Processes Accessed], "Procurement Process") > 0, [Procurement Category] <> NULL, OR( [Output] <> "Subcontract", AND( [Output] = "Subcontract", [Head Agreement RecordID] <> NULL ) ) ) ),
"Roles", HASH( "Display Name", "Roles",
"Validation", LET $roles := EACH [Role];
LET $allocatedRoles := ARRAY_WHERE( $roles, $(i, item) [Individual in Role]#$i <> NULL );
LET $reqRoles := ARRAY_WHERE( [Required Roles], $(i, item) ARRAY_INDEXOF($allocatedRoles, $item) = 0 ); RETURN ARRAY( IF([Required Roles Populated] <> TRUE, HASH("Error ID", "Required Roles", "Message", "The following required roles have not been allocated: " & ARRAY_JOIN($reqRoles, ", "))), ), "Completion", AND( ARRAY_INDEXOF([Processes Accessed], "Roles") > 0, [Required Roles Populated] = TRUE ) ),
"Award Type", HASH( "Display Name", "Award Type",
"Validation", ARRAY( IF([Contract Type] = NULL, HASH("Error ID", "Contract Type", "Message", "Contract type is required")), IF([Start Date] = NULL, HASH("Error ID", "Start Date", "Message", "Start Date is required")), IF(AND([Perpetual] <> TRUE, [Original End Date] = NULL), HASH("Error ID", "Original End Date", "Message", "Award end date / duration is required")), ), "Completion", AND( [Contract Type] <> NULL, OR([Original End Date] <> NULL, [Perpetual] = TRUE) ) ),
"Exemption Approval", HASH( "Display Name", "Exemption Approval",
"Validation", ( LET $approvalRequired := ( LET $type := "Exemption"; LET $workflowSettings := HASH_GET([Approval Workflow Settings], $type); RETURN NOT(HASH_GET($workflowSettings, "Not Required")) );
RETURN ARRAY( IF(AND([Exemption Approved] <> TRUE, $approvalRequired = TRUE), HASH("Error ID", "Exemption Approval", "Message", "Exemption approval required")), IF(AND([Exemption Approved] <> TRUE, $approvalRequired <> TRUE), HASH("Error ID", "Exemption Approval", "Message", "Exemption activation required")), ) ), "Completion", AND( [Exemption Approved] = TRUE ) ),
"Setup Approval", HASH( "Display Name", "Approval",
"Validation", ARRAY( IF([Approval to Initiate Procurement Complete] <> TRUE, HASH("Error ID", "Approval", "Message", "Approval required")), ), "Completion", AND( [Approval to Initiate Procurement Complete] = TRUE ) ),
"Approval", HASH( "Display Name", "Approval",
"Validation", ARRAY( IF([Approval to Initiate Procurement Complete] <> TRUE, HASH("Error ID", "Approval", "Message", "Approval required")), ), "Completion", AND( [Approval to Initiate Procurement Complete] = TRUE ) ),
"Confirmation", HASH( "Validation", ARRAY( IF(1 <> 1, "") ), "Completion", AND( [Current Stage] <> "Initiate", [Current Stage] <> "Setup" ) ),
"Setup - Checklist", HASH( "Display Name", "Checklist",
"Validation", ARRAY( IF( AND( HASH_GET([Process Completion Hash - Stored], "Checklist - Setup") <> TRUE, EACH [Checklist - Initiate Item Text] <> ARRAY() ), HASH("Error ID", "Initiate Checklist", "Message", "Complete all items in the checklist before moving forward") ) ), "Completion", AND( OR( HASH_GET([Process Completion Hash - Stored], "Checklist - Setup") = TRUE, EACH [Checklist - Initiate Item Text] = ARRAY() ) ) ),
//END SETUP STEPS //------------------------------------------------------------------------------- //START PLANNING STEPS
"Budget Consideration", HASH( "Display Name", "Budget",
"Validation", ARRAY( IF(1 <> 1, "") //IF([Name of Budget] = NULL, HASH("Error ID", "Budget", "Message", "Name of budget required")), ), "Completion", AND( ARRAY_INDEXOF([Processes Accessed], "Budget Consideration") > 0 ) ),
"Timeline", HASH( "Validation", ARRAY( IF(1 <> 1, "") ), "Completion", AND( ARRAY_INDEXOF([Processes Accessed], "Timeline") > 0 ) ),
"Evaluation Planning", HASH( "Validation", ARRAY( IF( [Preferred Evaluation System] = NULL, HASH("Error ID", "Evaluation Tool", "Message", "Select an evaluation tool") ), IF( [Evaluations Teams Locked] <> TRUE, HASH("Error ID", "Evaluation Team", "Message", "Select and lock-in an evaluation team") ), IF( AND( [Requirements Finalised] <> TRUE, [Preferred Evaluation System] <> NULL ), HASH("Error ID", "Evaluation Criteria", "Message", "Select and lock-in requirements and criteria") ) ),
"Completion", AND( [Requirements Finalised] = TRUE, [Evaluations Teams Locked] = TRUE ) ),
"Identify Risks", HASH( "Display Name", "Risks",
"Validation", ARRAY( IF([Risks Complete] <> TRUE, HASH("Error ID", "Risks", "Message", "Confirm that all risks have been identified before moving forward")) ), "Completion", AND( [Risks Complete] = TRUE ) ),
"Value Risk Assessment", HASH( "Display Name", "Assessment(s)",
"Validation", ARRAY( IF(HASH_GET([Process Completion Hash - Stored], "Initial Assessment") <> TRUE, HASH("Error ID", "Initial Assessment", "Message", "Complete assessment before moving forward")), IF(AND([Value Risk Assessment Required] = TRUE, HASH_GET([Process Completion Hash - Stored], "Value Risk Assessment") <> TRUE), HASH("Error ID", "Value Risk Assessment", "Message", "Complete assessment before moving forward")) ), "Completion", AND( OR( AND(HASH_GET([Process Completion Hash - Stored], "Initial Assessment") = TRUE, [Value Risk Assessment Required] <> TRUE), HASH_GET([Process Completion Hash - Stored], "Value Risk Assessment") = TRUE, ) ) ),
"Plan - Checklist", HASH( "Display Name", "Checklist",
"Validation", ARRAY( IF( AND( HASH_GET([Process Completion Hash - Stored], "Checklist - Plan") <> TRUE, EACH [Checklist - Plan Item Text] <> ARRAY() ), HASH("Error ID", "Planning Checklist", "Message", "Complete all items in the checklist before moving forward") ) ), "Completion", AND( OR( HASH_GET([Process Completion Hash - Stored], "Checklist - Plan") = TRUE, EACH [Checklist - Plan Item Text] = ARRAY() ) ) ),
"Procurement Plan Approval", HASH( "Validation", ARRAY( IF([Plan Approval Complete] <> TRUE, HASH("Error ID", "Plan Approval", "Message", "Plan approval must be completed before proceeding")) ), "Completion", AND( [Plan Approval Complete] = TRUE ) ),
"Procurement Plan Complete", HASH( "Validation", ARRAY( IF(1 <> 1, "") ), "Completion", AND( [Award RecordID] <> NULL ) ),
//END PLANNING STEPS //------------------------------------------------------------------------------- //START ADVERTISING STEPS
"Advertise", HASH( "Display Name", "Advertising Outlets",
"Validation", ARRAY( IF(1 <> 1, "") ), "Completion", AND( TRUE//[Award RecordID] <> NULL ) ),
"Download Responses", HASH( "Display Name", "Go to Market",
"Validation", ARRAY( IF(1 <> 1, "") ), "Completion", AND( IF( AND([GoToMarket Integration] == TRUE, [GoToMarket Integrated System] = "VendorPanel"),[Advertise Complete] = TRUE, TRUE) ) ),
"Advertise - Checklist", HASH( "Display Name", "Checklist",
"Validation", ARRAY( IF( AND( HASH_GET([Process Completion Hash - Stored], "Checklist - Advertise") <> TRUE, EACH [Checklist - Advertise Item Text] <> ARRAY() ), HASH("Error ID", "Advertise Checklist", "Message", "Complete all items in the checklist before moving forward") ) ), "Completion", AND( OR( HASH_GET([Process Completion Hash - Stored], "Checklist - Advertise") = TRUE, EACH [Checklist - Advertise Item Text] = ARRAY() ) ) ),
//END ADVERTISING STEPS //------------------------------------------------------------------------------- //START AwARD STEPS
"Award", HASH( "Display Name", "Award Details",
"Validation", ARRAY( IF(1 <> 1, "") ), "Completion", AND(TRUE) ),
"Create Award", HASH( "Display Name", "Award Details",
"Validation", ARRAY( IF(1 <> 1, "") ), "Completion", AND(TRUE) ) );
LET $transformed := ARRAY_SELECT( HASH_KEYS($processData), $(p, processKey) ( LET $processInformation := HASH_GET($processData, $processKey); LET $completionRules := HASH_GET($processInformation, "Completion"); LET $validationRules := HASH_GET($processInformation, "Validation"); LET $displayName := HASH_GET($processInformation, "Display Name");
LET $validationRules := ARRAY_WHERE( ARRAY_SELECT( $validationRules, $(i, item) IF($disableValidation <> TRUE, $item) ), $(i, item) $item <> NULL );
LET $displayName := COALESCE($displayName, $processKey);
RETURN INDEXES_TO_KEYS( ARRAY($displayName, $completionRules, $validationRules), ARRAY("Display Name", "Completion", "Validation"), ) ) );
RETURN INDEXES_TO_KEYS( $transformed, HASH_KEYS($processData) )

Estimated Value Tax Inclusive

[Reset Available] )

Binding.Expression: [Wizard Status] <> "Not Started"
[Wizard Status] <> "Not Started"

LET $controlHeight := 10 * 6; LET $controlWidth := 47 * 20; LET $selectedStageColour := "#4682B4"; LET $notselectedStageColour := "#304a60"; LET $disabledColour := "#d5d1d1";
LET $verticalPadding := $controlHeight / 4; LET $numberOfStages := ARRAY_LENGTH([Stage List]);
RETURN " <style>
.core-chevron-navigation li div span { " & IF( ARRAY_LENGTH([Stage List]) = 1, "padding-left: 60px;",
ARRAY_LENGTH([Stage List]) = 2, "padding-left: 35px;",
ARRAY_LENGTH([Stage List]) = 3, "padding-left: 35px;",
ARRAY_LENGTH([Stage List]) = 4, "padding-left: 35px;",
ARRAY_LENGTH([Stage List]) >= 5, "padding-left: 25px;" ) & " }
.core-chevron-navigation li { flex: 100%; padding: 1px;" &
IF( ARRAY_LENGTH([Stage List]) <= 3, "margin: 0 0 0 -53px;",
ARRAY_LENGTH([Stage List]) = 4, "margin: 0 0 0 -40px;",
ARRAY_LENGTH([Stage List]) >= 5, "margin: 0 0 0 -27px;" ) &
IF( ARRAY_LENGTH([Stage List]) <= 3, "-webkit-clip-path: polygon(11% 50%, 1% 0%, 86% 0%, 96% 50%, 86% 100%, 1% 100%);",
ARRAY_LENGTH([Stage List]) = 4, "-webkit-clip-path: polygon(11% 50%, 1% 0%, 86% 0%, 96% 50%, 86% 100%, 1% 100%);",
ARRAY_LENGTH([Stage List]) >= 5, "-webkit-clip-path: polygon(10% 50%, 0% 0%, 87% 0%, 97% 50%, 87% 100%, 0% 100%);" ) & " } .core-chevron-navigation li:last-child { " & IF( ARRAY_LENGTH([Stage List]) = 1, "-webkit-clip-path: polygon(11% 50%, 1% 0%, calc(100% - 6px) 0%, calc(100% - 6px) 50%, calc(100% - 6px) 100%, 1% 100%); text-align: center;",
ARRAY_LENGTH([Stage List]) = 2, "-webkit-clip-path: polygon(11% 50%, 1% 0%, calc(100% - 3px) 0%, calc(100% - 3px) 50%, calc(100% - 3px) 100%, 1% 100%);",
ARRAY_LENGTH([Stage List]) = 3, "-webkit-clip-path: polygon(11% 50%, 1% 0%, 100% 0%, 100% 50%, 100% 100%, 1% 100%);",
ARRAY_LENGTH([Stage List]) = 4, "-webkit-clip-path: polygon(11% 50%, 1% 0%, 100% 0%, 100% 50%, 100% 100%, 1% 100%);",
ARRAY_LENGTH([Stage List]) >= 5, "-webkit-clip-path: polygon(10% 50%, 0% 0%, 100% 0%, 100% 50%, 100% 100%, 0% 100%);" ) & " } </style> "

RichLabel.Text:
<style type="text/css">.core-process-icon-container{
  background: white; 
  border-radius: 100%; 
  border: 3px solid;
  padding: 5px; 
  box-sizing: border-box;
}
.core-chevron-navigation
{
  padding-inline-start: 10px;
  font-weight: bold; 
  display: flex;
  list-style: none;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  height: 100%;
  font-size: 16px;
}
.core-chevron-navigation li
{
  text-decoration: none;
}
.coreProcurementTitleTextContainer
{
  width: 100%; 
  max-height:35px; 
  overflow: auto;
}
.coreProcurementTitleText
{
  font-size: 2.5em; 
  color:#000000; 
  margin-right: 5px;
}
.core-chevron-navigation .selected
{
  color: #1E70B5; 
}

.core-chevron-navigation .selected div
{
  color: #1E70B5;
}

.core-chevron-navigation .notselected div
{ 
  color: black;
}

.core-chevron-navigation .disabled div
{
  background: #f8f9fa !important; 
  color: #bcbcbc; 
}

.core-chevron-navigation li div span
{
  padding-top: 17px; 
}

.core-chevron-navigation li:hover
{
  cursor: pointer; 
}
.core-chevron-navigation li div{
  height: 100%; 
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 4px;
}
.core-process-container
{
  display: inline-flex; 
  position: relative; 
  width: 100%; 
}
.core-process-svg-container div
{
  width: 100%; 
  height: 100%; 
}
.core-process-navigation {
  display: flex;
  list-style: none;
  position: relative;
  margin: 0;
  height: 100%;
  font-size: 12px;
  padding-inline-start: 0px;
  text-align: center; 
}
.core-process-line-dot {
  border-color: transparent;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  background: none;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  padding: 5px; 
}
.core-process-navigation li {
  flex: 100%;
}
.core-line-between-processes
{
  z-index: 2; 
  height: 2px; 
  position: absolute; 
  width: 50%; 
  top: 14px;
}
.core-process-svg-container
{
  padding-left: 50%; 
  margin-left: -16px; 
  z-index: 2;
  height: 30px; 
  width: 30px;
  cursor: pointer; 
}
.core-process-text-container
{
  z-index: 2;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #1E70B5;
  font-size: 14px;
  padding: 10px 10px 10px 10px;

<style type="text/css">/* CSS talk bubble */
.talk-bubble {
	margin: 40px;
  display: inline-block;
  position: relative;
	width: 200px;
	height: auto;
	background-color: lightyellow;
}
.border{
  border: 8px solid #666;
}
.round{
  border-radius: 30px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 30px;
	-moz-border-radius: 30px;

}

/* Right triangle placed top left flush. */
.tri-right.border.left-top:before {
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: -40px;
	right: auto;
  top: -8px;
	bottom: auto;
	border: 32px solid;
	border-color: #666 transparent transparent transparent;
}
.tri-right.left-top:after{
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;

	right: auto;
  top: 0px;
	bottom: auto;

RichLabel.Text:
<style type="text/css">.core-process-icon-container{
  background: white; 
  border-radius: 100%; 
  border: 3px solid;
  padding: 5px; 
  box-sizing: border-box;
}
.core-chevron-navigation
{
  padding-inline-start: 10px;
  font-weight: bold; 
  display: flex;
  list-style: none;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  height: 100%;
  font-size: 16px;
}
.core-chevron-navigation li
{
  text-decoration: none;
}

.core-chevron-navigation .selected
{
  color: #1E70B5; 
}

.core-chevron-navigation .selected div
{
  color: #1E70B5;
}

.core-chevron-navigation .notselected div
{ 
  color: black;
}

.core-chevron-navigation .disabled div
{
  background: #f8f9fa !important; 
  color: #bcbcbc; 
}

.core-chevron-navigation li div span
{
  padding-top: 17px; 
}

.core-chevron-navigation li:hover
{
  cursor: pointer; 
}
.core-chevron-navigation li div{
  height: 100%; 
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 4px;
}
.core-process-container
{
  display: inline-flex; 
  position: relative; 
  width: 100%; 
}
.core-process-svg-container div
{
  width: 100%; 
  height: 100%; 
}
.core-process-navigation {
  display: flex;
  list-style: none;
  position: relative;
  margin: 0;
  height: 100%;
  font-size: 12px;
  padding-inline-start: 0px;
  text-align: center; 
}
.core-process-line-dot {
  border-color: transparent;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  background: none;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  padding: 5px; 
}
.core-process-navigation li {
  flex: 100%;
}
.core-line-between-processes
{
  z-index: 2; 
  height: 2px; 
  position: absolute; 
  width: 50%; 
  top: 14px;
}
.core-process-svg-container
{
  padding-left: 50%; 
  margin-left: -16px; 
  z-index: 2;
  height: 30px; 
  width: 30px;
  cursor: pointer; 
}
.coreProcurementTitleTextContainer
{
  width: 100%; 
  max-height:35px; 
  overflow: auto;
}
.coreProcurementTitleText
{
  font-size: 2.5em; 
  color:#000000; 
  margin-right: 5px;
}
.core-process-text-container
{
  z-index: 2;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #1E70B5;
  font-size: 14px;
  padding: 10px 10px 10px 10px;
}
</style>

RichLabel.Text:
<style type="text/css">.core-process-icon-container{
  background: white; 
  border-radius: 100%; 
  border: 3px solid;
  padding: 5px; 
  box-sizing: border-box;
}
.core-chevron-navigation
{
  padding-inline-start: 10px;
  font-weight: bold; 
  display: flex;
  list-style: none;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  height: 100%;
  font-size: 16px;
}
.core-chevron-navigation li
{
  text-decoration: none;
}

.core-chevron-navigation .selected
{
  color: #1E70B5; 
}

.core-chevron-navigation .selected div
{
  color: #1E70B5;
}

.core-chevron-navigation .notselected div
{ 
  color: black;
}

.core-chevron-navigation .disabled div
{
  background: #f8f9fa !important; 
  color: #bcbcbc; 
}

.core-chevron-navigation li div span
{
  padding-top: 17px; 
}

.core-chevron-navigation li:hover
{
  cursor: pointer; 
}
.core-chevron-navigation li div{
  height: 100%; 
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 4px;
}
.core-process-container
{
  display: inline-flex; 
  position: relative; 
  width: 100%; 
}
.core-process-svg-container div
{
  width: 100%; 
  height: 100%; 
}
.core-process-navigation {
  display: flex;
  list-style: none;
  position: relative;
  margin: 0;
  height: 100%;
  font-size: 12px;
  padding-inline-start: 0px;
  text-align: center; 
}
.core-process-line-dot {
  border-color: transparent;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  background: none;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  padding: 5px; 
}
.core-process-navigation li {
  flex: 100%;
}
.core-line-between-processes
{
  z-index: 2; 
  height: 2px; 
  position: absolute; 
  width: 50%; 
  top: 14px;
}
.core-process-svg-container
{
  padding-left: 50%; 
  margin-left: -16px; 
  z-index: 2;
  height: 30px; 
  width: 30px;
  cursor: pointer; 
}
.coreProcurementTitleTextContainer
{
  width: 100%; 
  max-height:35px; 
  overflow: auto;
}
.coreProcurementTitleText
{
  font-size: 2.5em; 
  color:#000000; 
  margin-right: 5px;
}
.core-process-text-container
{
  z-index: 2;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #1E70B5;
  font-size: 14px;
  padding: 10px 10px 10px 10px;
}
</style>

TextCriterion.Text: STEP TO [Conflict of Interest Declaration] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Assignee] AND [To].[Procurement RecordID] = [RecordID] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'No Write Access' <> TRUE

CASE -- Check if user in role which always has access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' THEN TRUE
--Check if the user is assigned to the Procurement record, or in the same department WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Procurement Officer] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Procurement Manager] OR DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [Department]) THEN TRUE
-- Check if user is an approver on an in progress submission for this record WHEN ( STEP TO CHILD [Submission] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] AND [To].[Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [RecordID] AND [To].[Status] = 'Submitted' ) GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE
-- Check if an exemption is required on the Procurement or if the user is an approver on an evaluation WHEN ( STEP TO [Submission] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] AND( ([To].[Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [Exemption RecordID] AND [To].[Type] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Exemption') OR ([To].[Significant Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [RecordID] AND [To].[Significant Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Procurement') ) AND [To].[Status] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Submitted' ) GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE
-- Check if the user is required to complete a COI on the Procurement WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'External Evaluation Panel Members' THEN (STEP TO [Conflict of Interest Declaration] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Assignee] AND [To].[Procurement RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0) > 0)
ELSE FALSE
END

CASE -- Check if user in role which always has access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' THEN TRUE
--Check if the user is assigned to the Procurement record, or in the same department WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Procurement Officer] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Procurement Manager] THEN TRUE
ELSE FALSE
END

CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'No Write Access' <> TRUE

CASE -- Check if user in role which always has access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' THEN TRUE
-- Check if user is an approver on an in progress submission for this record WHEN ( STEP TO CHILD [Submission] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] AND [To].[Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [RecordID] AND [To].[Status] = 'Submitted' ) GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE
-- Check if an exemption is required on the Procurement or if the user is an approver on an evaluation WHEN ( STEP TO [Submission] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] AND( ([To].[Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [Exemption RecordID] AND [To].[Type] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Exemption') OR ([To].[Significant Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [RecordID] AND [To].[Significant Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Procurement') ) AND [To].[Status] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Submitted' ) GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE
-- Check if the user is required to complete a COI on the Procurement WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'External Evaluation Panel Members' THEN (STEP TO [Conflict of Interest Declaration] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Assignee] AND [To].[Procurement RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0) > 0)
ELSE FALSE
END

RETURN IF( $result <> NULL, ARRAY($result), $result )

FieldEntry.Formula: DB_LOOKUP( "Date Criteria Locked", "Evaluation", "[LineNumber] = 1", HASH( "parent", ARRAY(EFormType, RecordID), "credentials", "e9d3d74b-317d-4647-a2fe-3d2f6d3c9601" ) )
DB_LOOKUP( "Panel Members Locked", "Evaluation", "[LineNumber] = 1", HASH( "parent", ARRAY(EFormType, RecordID), "credentials", "e9d3d74b-317d-4647-a2fe-3d2f6d3c9601" ) )
LET $line := ARRAY_INDEXOF(EACH [Role], "Procurement Manager"); RETURN [Username in Role]#$line
LET $line := ARRAY_INDEXOF(EACH [Role], "Procurement Officer"); RETURN [Username in Role]#$line

Event.Name: Refresh Submission Data
Event.Description: Recalculates the default Submission Data formula (to prevent multiple submissions being raised from a single Procurement)

TriggerCustomEvent.EventNameTemplate: Add System Update to File Notes
TriggerCustomEvent.Description: Add System Update to File Notes

FieldEntry.Formula: IF( HASH_GET($eventargs, "Reset To") = "Plan", HASH( "Setup", HASH_GET([Stage Completion Data], "Setup") ), NULL )

TriggerCustomEvent.EventArgumentsFormula: HASH( "Request Source", ARRAY(EFormType, RecordID), "Requester System Name", "Procurement Planning", "Request Type", "Go to SD", "CorrelationId", [SD Request GUID] )

FieldEntry.Formula: IF( ARRAY_INDEXOF([Stages Complete], "Setup") >0, //if setup is complete NULL, [SD Request GUID] )
IF( [Current Stage] == "Setup", 1, [Current Stage] == "Plan", 2, [Current Stage] == "Advertise", 3, [Current Stage] == "Evaluate", 4, [Current Stage] == "Award", 5 )

IF( [Stage Name] = "Initiate", [Initiate Completion Date], [Stage Name] = "Plan", [Planning Completion Date], [Stage Name] = "Advertise", [Advertise Completion Date], [Stage Name] = "Evaluate", [Evaluation Completion Date], [Stage Name] = "Award", [Award Completion Date] )
IF( [Stage Name] = "Initiate", "1. Initiate", [Stage Name] = "Plan", "2. Plan", [Stage Name] = "Advertise", "3. Advertise", [Stage Name] = "Evaluate", "4. Evaluate", "" )
HASH_GET(HASH_GET([Wizard - Process Data], [Procurement Process RecordID]), "Procurement Process")

Event.Name: Wizard - Setup Validation
Event.Description: Called on raising submission or at the final step to ensure all steps up to that point have been completed
